uniol.apt.analysis.cycles.lts

Class AbstractComputeSmallestCycles

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.analysis.cycles.lts.AbstractComputeSmallestCycles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComputeSmallestCycles
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputeSmallestCyclesDFS, ComputeSmallestCyclesFloydWarshall, ComputeSmallestCyclesJohnson

    public abstract class AbstractComputeSmallestCycles
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComputeSmallestCycles
    This is a base class for implementing algorithms against the ComputeSmallestCycles interface
    Author:
    Chris, Manuel
